explains: n. 剩饭，剩菜（leftovers）；残存物，遗留物
wordGroup: leftover material 边角料；剩余材料

sentences.en: You have to spit out any food leftover.
sentences.cn: 你不得不将任何食物吃剩的部分吐出来。

sentences.en: Come over here and help me pack up the leftover food.
sentences.cn: 过来帮我把剩下的食物打包。

sentences.en: She had no stomach for the leftover stew.
